headers.value: default-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.live; font-src 'self' data: *.vercel.app vercel.live *.gstatic.com fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.vercel.app vercel.live fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.live api.knock.app wss://api.knock.app; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.vercel.app vercel.live
